# [Interview #974: AMOL Signing Report - J. Dauro, Entry #81](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=974#81)

#### Question

Is the Town, the only human settlement in the Blight?

#### Brandon Sanderson

I believe so.

#### Question

And was the Town the same cluster of building that was seen by Graendal in
*Towers of Midnight*
from Moridin's...

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes.
